release.action: Description about the action.
Added the environment variables to the SystemInfo.getSystemInformation call
Added the 'ALT-C' shortcut to the Log4J viewer to clean the log entries
Added the getDouble to the XPathHelper classes
Added support for the Web Service Inspector to the Snapshot grabber tool.
The SoapFaultInfo had a bug in detecting the error.
Added ValidateXML class to validae an XML against an XSD
Added classes for schema validation
Fixed some issues in the XPathHelper in case an XPath returned a null resultset
Added the commandline details to the CmdLine exception object.
Added an additional option to the Cordys Gateway Client to skip the parsing of the user info.
Added support for the Upload.wcp to the Cordys Gateway Client.
Migrated the CordysGatewayClient to Http Client 4.2.2
Fixed a bug in the XPathHelper class for DOM. It would return the wrong data when using the getStringValue() without an XPath ending with /text().
Added APIs to also have the setStringValue operations.
Fixes to the snapshot grabber.
Added 64 bits SWT binaries.
Applied patch from Saketh on SAML cookie problem in the gateway client.
Fixed a problem in the SOAP wrapper when detecting a SOAP fault.
Added the dynamic XPath methods to the XPathHelper class. These methods clean up the underlying XPath object explicitly, thus improving memory usage.
Fixed some Generics things with the WsAppsQueryWrapper
Changed the XPathHelper to explicitly clean up the result sets from XPath.
Finalized UI for editing the configuration.
Migrated to BOP4. Removed the ISVP, because the main focus is the coelib.jar. Marked all classes deprecated that are using the Find class.
Made the WsappsQueryManager use generics.
There was a bug in the XPathhelper.getDateValue(). If 4 digits or more were given for the ms, then the call would produce a weird date. Now all the digits are cut off after the 3rd one.
Added a tool called SystemSnapshotGrabber
Opensourced the Cordys CoE Library
Added the ISOAPWrapper interface to allow stubbing.
Added more options to the SOAPException class.
Added the result mapping to the query wrapper
Fixed CordysGatewayClient initialization with SSO authentication
Added instance generation based on the schema to the CoE Method TestTool
Small fixes to the SQLQueryWrapper class
Fixed the CordysGatewayClient bug when using SSO
Fixed a null pointer in the DOMXPathMetaInfo classes
Small fixes to the XMLProperties class for NOM with regard to the getProperties() method
Added the method com.cordys.coe.util.cpc.CPCUtilities.calculateDayDifference(Date a, Date b)

Added a special treatment to the JMX viewer to allow an easy overview of all threads that are running in the current JVM. To see this, just invoke the dumpAllThreads operation on the Threading object in java.lang.
Added additional functionality to the SqlWrapper class to be able to handle OR statements as well. Contributed by Przemek Chudzinski
Added some methods to the StringUtils class
Fixed a bug in the XMLHelper class in the createElementWithParentNS to be able to cope with parent elements that have no namespace
Added the DOMXPathMetaInfo class. It is JDK 1.4 compatible wrapper around the prefix resolver dor DOM
UTF-8 handling fixed for NiceDOMWriter
Fixed the SqlQueryWrapper to be able to cope with left/right inner/outer join statements
Added getDateValue methods the the XPathHelper classes.
Added the method groupBy to the SQL wrapper class
Added two new methods: XPathHelpers.evaluateToString and XPathHelpers.evaluateToStringArray.
Added the searchLDAP and readLDAPEntry to the Cordys Gateway Client
Added a new Swing-based tool: Organization Manager. This tool can manage SOAP processors and their configurations.
When using SSO the token was not obtained when test-mode was used.
The Log4J Viewer now uses a RegEx find as a fall-back mechanism if for some reason it was not able to parse the Log entry
The organization manager now also supports clusters.
Added the possibility to specify the receiver for the CordysGatewayClient
Fixed a bug in the CoEMessageSet which causes problems when the WebGatewayClient is run from within Eclipse
Fixed a bug in the build process for the coelib-full.jar. It didn't package some png files needed for the CGCLogin dialog.
Fixed the coetool build problems. Included the proper jars and used the C3 libs now.
Added a class called NameValuePair
Added a Swing util class ProgressDialog
Added the Swing dialog CGCLoginDialog when can be used to create a connection to a Cordys system in a Swing application
Added some additional DOM and NOM related XML helper methods (XPathHelper class).
Added some additional DOM related XML helper methods
Added a new tool: CoE XML Formatter
Added the ServerRuntimeLocalizableException and the WsAppsRuntimeLocalizableException classes
Extended the XPathHelper API of the dom variant
Added additional tool: FlowInfo This tool allows an easy view of current process data.
Changes the MessageDialog class to be able to resize it.
Added an interface to the sendsoapmessage so that it is possible to do some custom output handling with a java class.
Added SSO support to the CordysGatewayClient
Added a new generic SWT form to connect to a cordys environment
Added a tool to finds classes based on a certain classpath. This tool is usefull to figure out from which jar or folder a class is loaded.
Made the CordysGatewayClient understand C3 soap errors.

Added the package com.cordys.coe.util.i18n. This is an alternative way (using the default Java ResourceBundles) to do localization. It is compatible with Cordys using the IStringResource interface. This option allows you to include localization files within a jar.
Added the possibility to get the user information from the CordysGatewayClient
The CordysGatewayClient now also supports Custom Authentication
Completely revamped the structure of the Cordys Gateway client to support all different connection modes EXCEPT SSO. This is still pending.
Added a tool to test web services via the gateway. For now only NTLM authentication is supported. It has integrated support for handling XReport methods.
Added a tool which acts as a method test tool, but using the Web Gateway as a connection.
Updated to the 1.1.x range. The 1.1 is only compatible with C3 and no longer with C2 and below.
Fixed the NetworkDrive class to also support non-English windows systems
Added additional methods to the NOM XPathHelper class.
The coelib.js has been moved to it's own project: FELibrary.
Added a class NiceDOMWriter to properly format XML. The CoENiceDOMWriter is now deprecated.
